pageContent:
Dear
Hiring
Manager
,
I
am
excited
to
apply
for
the
Junior
React
Native
Developer
position
at
V
aultt

As
a
computer
science
student
at
Toronto
Metropolitan
University,
I
have
a
passion
for
creating
innovative
and
user-friendly
applications
using
cutting-edge
technologies

With
one
year
of
experience
in
full-stack
development
and
testing,
I
am
confident
that
I
have
the
skills
and
knowledge
to
contribute
to
your
projects
and
goals

During
my
previous
software
engineering
internship,
I
worked
on
developing
and
testing
web
applications
using
React.js,
Next.js,
Node.js,
and
Nest.js

Some
of
the
highlights
of
my
work
include:
●
Designing
and
implementing
an
automated
test
suite
for
the
API
in
Pytest
that
reduced
manual
testing
effort
by
90%
and
ensured
daily
full
endpoint
coverage
testing
with
alerts

●
Performing
API
testing
and
collabor
ating
with
the
teams
to
prioritize
and
resolve
bugs
and
technical
debts
using
Jira
and
Git

●
Recognizing
display
issues
on
the
company
dashboar
d
and
successfully
assisting
developers
to
fix
them,
resulting
in
improved
user
experience.
●
Learning
and
building
a
demo
backend
API
service
based
on
Nest

JS
in
a
short
amount
of
time,
taking
feedback
from
senior
devs
and
adapting
concepts
like
modular
design
and
good
styling
that
reduced
code
size
by
50%

●
Reporting
on
Jira
Kanban
whenever
a
bug/problem
was
discovered
and
keeping
100%
attendance
at
daily
standup
meetings.
I
am
eager
to
learn
more
about
V
aultt
projects
and
how
to
apply
my
skills
to
them

I
am
a
fast
learner
who
can
adapt
to
different
environments
and
challenges.
I
have
excellent

communication
and
organizational
skills
that
allow
me
to
work
effectively
with
others
under
pressure
and
meet
deadlines

I
am
committed
to
delivering
high-quality
work
that
meets
your
expectations.
Thank
you
for
your
consider
ation
of
my
application.
I
would
love
to
discuss
this
opportunity
further
with
you
in
an
interview
